name: Shiloh Summers

coverLetter:
To Whom It May Concern:
Originally from New England, I graduated college with a bachelors degree in business and economics, and moved out to California where I've spent the past three years working in high-end retail management. I just moved to Los Angeles, and am seeking new opportunities within the cannabis industry. I would like to start, and grow my cannabis career with an established organization. I am both very passionate and knowledgeable about cannabis, and am a firm believer in it's medicinal and economic benefits it provides. 

What makes me stand out against other candidates is my work-ethic, motivation, and innovation. As excellent as I am at following procedure and instructions, I do like to go the extra mile, and think of new ways to innovate and improve all aspects of a business. I've utilized this ability with my former employers, and have optimized their business models to become more profitable and efficient. My eagerness to learn and always self-improve also makes for a strong candidate. Lastly, my ability to not only bring the best version of myself to my work everyday, but bring out the best version of my colleagues is another strength I harness. 

I believe I can meet or exceed all expectations or this position. Feel free to contact me at any time.

Sincerely yours,
Shiloh Summers
